data_table.description: Sample ID, phenotype group, body site where from this sample was obtained, analyte type [DNA], and tumor status of samples obtained from participants of the "National Heart Lung and Blood Institute (NHLBI) GO-ESP: Heart Cohorts Component of the Exome Sequencing Project (ARIC)" study and the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: ESP_phenotype
variable.description: ESP Phenotype group [phenotype that the sample was selected to be sequenced for EOMI_Case, EOMI_Control, EOMI_Control_drop (note: these are samples that were selected as EOMI controls, but were later found to have had late onset MI or CABG), LDL_Low, LDL_Low, LDL_High, Stroke, BP_Low (low blood pressure), BP_High (high blood pressure), DPR, BMI_High]

variable.name: Body_site
variable.description: Body site or tissue that sample is from [Blood]

variable.name: Is_tumor
variable.description: Indicator of whether sample from tumor [N]
